snippet: The victims, whose nationality was not released, were in a helicopter that crashed on Monday with “no enemy activity in the area,” a spokesman said.
abstract: Five coalition soldiers are killed in helicopter crash in southern Afghanistan.
lead_paragraph: The victims, whose nationality was not released, were in a helicopter that crashed on Monday with “no enemy activity in the area,” a spokesman said.

headline.seo: Helicopter Crash Kills 5 Coalition Soldiers in Afghanistan
headline.main: Afghanistan: 5 Coalition Soldiers Killed in Crash
headline.print_headline: Afghanistan: 5 Coalition Soldiers Killed in Crash
